## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                 | Type    | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `data`              | --        | data to be displayed in the table           | `any[]` | `undefined` |
| `horizontalheaders` | --        | headers to be displayed in the first row    | `any[]` | `undefined` |
| `verticalheaders`   | --        | headers to be displayed in the first column | `any[]` | `undefined` |
